name: DeformSim
description: This is a brain deformation field simulation script that consists from a perl wrapper and a software     This PERL script is a wrapper that is calling sequence of commands for generating deformation fields scrips from https://wiki.mouseimaging.ca/display/MICePub/Generating+deformation+fields
author: Naj Mahani
command-line: deformation.pl [INPUT] [MASK] [OUTPUT] [DEFORMATION_RATIO] [COORDx] [COORDy] [COORDz] [SIZEx] [SIZEy] [SIZEz] [TOLERANCE_SPACE] [BLUR_DETERMINANT] [ERROR] [ITERATION] && cp *_deformed_by* [OUTDIR]; if [ yes == [DELTMP] ]; then rm -rf [OUTDIR]/TMP; fi

output-files.name: Output
output-files.description: A folder containing resulting, deformed image, where the name of the input file is by prefix deformed_by and values defined from ratio and coordinates, and optionally tmp files for debugging

inputs.description: A folder containing resulting, deformed image, where the name of the input file is by prefix deformed_by and values defined from ratio and coordinates, and optionally tmp files for debugging
inputs.name: Output
Deformation ratio
inputs.description: Deformation ratios. Values must be between 0.1 to 1.50

A tolerance map file (.mnc) indicating voxels that have a different amount of error allowed e.g., CSF, background. You can either provide mask or coordinates of deformation, but not both in the same time.
inputs.name: Mask
Tolerance space
inputs.description: Define the area of tolerance around the deformation.

inputs.name: Blur determinant
inputs.description: Blurring kernel size for blurring deformation determinant blurring kernel 0-1

inputs.name: Error
inputs.description: Specify the amount of error that is allowed between the specified determinant and the final determinant (per voxel)

inputs.name: Iteration
inputs.description: Specify the maximum number of iterations to update the deformations field (-1 means until convergence)

groups.name: Coordinates
groups.description: A hyperslab starting at x, y, z and extending in respective directions by sizex, sizey, sizez
